p: In the cases where a presumptive aetiological agent could not be clearly established, further analysis to detect unknown RNA viruses were undertaken with the program rnaSPAdes [ 44], an RNAseq de novo assembler included in the package SPADES [ 45]. Also, the RNAseq outputs were analysed with VirFind, a web-based bioinformatic pipeline specifically designed for virus detection and discovery [ 46]. In both cases, the default parameters provided by the programs were used.
